high_descs: Pick up the cell phone from the dresser
Turn left and go to the lamp
Hold the cell phone and turn the lamp on
anns.task_desc: Pick up the cell phone and look at it by the light of the lamp

high_descs: Walk to the dresser in front of you.
Pick up the cell phone, above the left, top drawer, on the dresser.
Go to the lamp to your left, in the corner of the room.
pick up the phone that is on the dresser
take a couple step to the left to face lamp, hold phone up
anns.task_desc: examine a phone with a lamp
